string-array.name: name
string-array.item: Apple
Beme
Square
Uber
Twitter
Google
Samsung
Facebook
Watsi
Airbnb

string-array.name: descrip
string-array.item: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino,California, that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services.
Beme is a platform for capturing and sharing your daily life.
Square, Inc. is a financial services, merchant services aggregator and mobile payment company based in San Francisco, California.
Uber Technologies Inc. is an American multinational online transportation network company headquartered in San Francisco, California.

Twitter is an online social networking service that enables users to send and read short 140-character messages called "tweets". Registered users can read and post tweets, but those who are unregistered can only read them.
Google is an American multinational technology company specializing in Internet-related services and products that include online advertising technologies, search, cloud computing, and software.

Samsung is a South Korean multinational conglomerate company headquartered in Samsung Town, Seoul. It comprises numerous subsidiaries and affiliated businesses, most of them united under the Samsung brand, and is the largest South Korean chaebol.
Facebook is a for-profit corporation and online social networking service based in Menlo Park, California, United States.
Watsi is a global funding platform for medical treatments
Airbnb is an online marketplace that enables people to list, find, then rent vacation homes for a processing fee. It has over 1,500,000 listings in 34,000 cities and 191 countries.
